website_summaries.verdict: This portable kids' desk is just the right size and weight for little laps and comes in a variety of adorable animal designs.
pros: Cute and colorful pet prints are sure to appeal to the younger crowd
Features a well-cushioned base for superior user comfort
Built-in carrying handle makes it a breeze to transport
cons: Some parents complain that the unicorn desk is smaller than others

customer_reviews.title: Unicorn lap desk way too small.
customer_reviews.text: This is a cute item..I’ll give it that. I just wish it was bigger. The cat lap desk came at the same time as the unicorn one and the cat one is perfect size for my other 11 year old granddaughter. The unicorn would fit a toddler not my 7 year old granddaughter. Oh well maybe she can get some use out of it. Just for anyone wanting to buy..it’s very small. And will fit a tablet not a computer as the info says.
customer_reviews.author: JencyAlewinePalmer

customer_reviews.title: A wonderful travel companion for a child in a car seat.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for a very long road trip traveling with my 5 year old granddaughter. She loved it. She used it to keep her play buddies on her lap using the surface to hold quite a few. On the 7 hour trip, she used it all the time except for nap time.
customer_reviews.author: EasyCamper

customer_reviews.title: Okay but cute
customer_reviews.text: It is great for my little writer. Wish it was slightly larger and had a pencil/pen holder and maybe a ledge along the bottom to hold a book or notebook.
customer_reviews.author: JH

customer_reviews.title: Super cute but came damaged and looks like it’s been used.
customer_reviews.text: I ordered two of these for my daughters for Christmas. The unicorn one was perfect but the cat came with multiple scratches and damaged edges. It’s useable but doesn’t look new. Disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: David Morrison

customer_reviews.title: Very cute
customer_reviews.text: I loved this and gave it to my 7-year-old great-granddaughter for Christmas. I thought it a little small. She liked the unicorn and used it not only to draw on, but turned it over and used it as a pillow and seat cushion while playing with other toys on Christmas day. Don't know whether she'll get a lot of use out of it as it was intended, yet. But I think when she's sick in bed it'll get used a lot. Hope so! It really is darling.
customer_reviews.author: Valentina S.

customer_reviews.title: Reccomended!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this lap desk for my 9-year-old daughter. She loves this little table, it's the perfect size for her AND it fits nicely over her booster seat in the car. Good quality. My only complaint (and that's me really looking for one) is I wish it had an area for her pencil to sit.
customer_reviews.author: Caitie

customer_reviews.title: Perfect size for kids
customer_reviews.text: This was perfect for what I needed. My family and I we attending a convention. I knew that my 3 year old would want to write and wouldn't really have a surface to do so in coliseum seats. This was exactly what we needed. It gave her the right sized surface to write, color and draw. Since it has a handle, we now use it everywhere.
customer_reviews.author: B. Green

customer_reviews.title: Convenient and comfortable!
customer_reviews.text: My 9 year old has enjoyed using this for reading, playing games and studying for her exams. Obviously it's something that is mobile, making it nice and convenient when on the road and for roadtrips. It is also well made of good quality which tells me it will last a solid amount of time. My daughter seems to really enjoy using it. That being said, I would recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Joe M

customer_reviews.title: Really cute and Sturdy
customer_reviews.text: I was a little hesitant about this purchased and weather it was going to work for my 7 year old. But the quality is great, nice and sturdy and perfect for my 7 year old distance learning since we don't have a desk and we have to use our bed. It does help her a lot with her Chromebook staying in place. The only thing is that I wish it would have been a little bigger for it to fit her mouse and Chromebook at the same time. Because it's only wide enough for a Chromebook and that's it. We got the Panda one and it's really cute!
customer_reviews.author: maricela zepeda

customer_reviews.title: Recommended!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this lap desk for my 2-year-old son. We use it as a coloring table, or book table while we read. Very versatile. Fits nicely over our car seat. Good quality. My only complaint (and that's me really looking for one) is I wish it had an area for his craysons to sit.
customer_reviews.author: Caitie

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful & Well Constructed
customer_reviews.text: This is the second lapdesk that I've bought so that I can use my laptop while I'm on the bed. The design is beautiful, thought out and well constructed, from the details of the panda to the accents and the fabric and fill of it doesn't feel empty. It is sturdy. I just forgot to check the dimensions, it is the same price as my other one, however this one is smaller in comparison which threw me off, although the title is not misleading so that is off my own fault. This is absolutely great.
customer_reviews.author: itstommyvu

customer_reviews.title: Great idea...bad quality
customer_reviews.text: My 4 year old absolutely loves this; but the first one we received had horrible scratches on the top. We exchanged for another one, sadly it showed up with scratches on the top also (thankful smaller scratches). Unfortunately, we can't exchanged for another one. Since my daughter fell in love with it I can't return it. Sadly I'm left paying for a defective item.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for car trips and worth every penny
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my granddaughter for a car trip. She loved the design and how comfortable it was on her lap. She is 6 and it held her 10" Kindle perfectly and kept her drawing sheets level. Lightweight to carry and seems sturdy.
customer_reviews.author: Grannyred

customer_reviews.title: So Cute!
customer_reviews.text: My eight year old daughter is obsessed with pandas. I bought this for her to inspire her to do her homework and possibly making homework for fun for her. The padded cushion is thick and nice. This laptop desk is so cute!
customer_reviews.author: Lauren

customer_reviews.title: Versatile
customer_reviews.text: Super lightweight and nice bright colors. My daughter uses it for everything. She uses it for writing and homework but also to eat in front of the tv, which is better for me than the sofa cushions.
customer_reviews.author: Lizzie

customer_reviews.title: SUPER CUTE AND PERFECT FOR CHILD
customer_reviews.text: My daughter loves her unicorn lap desk. It is exactly how it's pictured in the photos. We are doing online learning right now and needed something for her to want to learn. This makes her feel important. I highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Wyatt

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed.
customer_reviews.text: I loved this until I realized the color was wiping off. This is not being used by a child or getting wet. As cute as these are and and well as they work I would not recommend them if you want it for the look.
customer_reviews.author: Freya

customer_reviews.title: Super cute
customer_reviews.text: These are awesome. I bought the unicorn and the dog for my kids (age 5 and 1) obviously my 5 year old had an easier time using it but they seem really sturdy and good quality so I'm sure they'll last and give my 1 year old time to get use out of his.
customer_reviews.author: Shaianne Brunell

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for long trips
customer_reviews.text: Went to Yosemite and she colored pictures and watched movies on it! No complaints! Quality product!
customer_reviews.author: Hans

customer_reviews.title: Works well
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my two-year-old so she can color on her books or whatever while sitting and although she doesn't really use it for that she doesn't use it for other things and it's held up well
customer_reviews.author: LJ

customer_reviews.title: LapGear Lap Pets Lap Desk for Lil' Kids - Puppy
customer_reviews.text: Very pleased with this purchase. The lap desk is sturdy and really pretty. I purchased a total of three for my girls. ( this one which is smaller and two of the larger ones).
customer_reviews.author: Dora H.

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: This is a very useful lap desk in our homeschool. It's held up to some rough treatment as well. Even though dimensions are given, it was just a bit smaller than I expected.
customer_reviews.author: Briana C.

customer_reviews.title: Great 👍🏼 purchase
customer_reviews.text: Grandson LOVES !! Came two days earlier than promised !!! So cute. He’s 2 yrs old. Perfect size for his tablet and a snack on the couch, and drawing ✍️ or writing !!
customer_reviews.author: Donna Chambliss

customer_reviews.title: What you see is what you get
customer_reviews.text: Had one before they nightlight and groove for your pencil so it wouldn’t roll off. This one was a little small and there was no place to keep your pencil
customer_reviews.author: Julie A. Bacon

customer_reviews.title: Adorable/ useful
customer_reviews.text: My daughter has a thing with sitting at the table so this comes in handy. My only dislike is it's kind of small, but my daughter still manages to complete her work with it.
customer_reviews.author: Desiree'

customer_reviews.title: Kids love it
customer_reviews.text: I got this for my daughter she uses it everyday for her chromebook and she uses it for worksheets and workbooks. Has a good amount of space for that. She's also in love with llamas so you can't go wrong.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Buy
customer_reviews.text: I bought this as a gift for my niece and she loved it. It's very sturdy and the colors are beautiful. She uses it as a desk and flips it over to use the other side as a pillow.
customer_reviews.author: *Starr*

customer_reviews.title: Cute Lap Desk
customer_reviews.text: Ordered the llama and it is very cute, light weight, and sturdy. The ears are flexible felt that bend, not misshapen. My seven year old is excited to have a small sturdy space she can move with her.
customer_reviews.author: Tammy S Clarke

customer_reviews.title: Great buy, Great price, cute puppy!
customer_reviews.text: My son loves his desk for coloring or snacks on the go, we bought this for the airplane for our upcoming trip to Florida but we’ve found so many more uses for his new desk! Great buy, great price!
customer_reviews.author: KristaM

customer_reviews.title: The perfect gift.
customer_reviews.text: This lap tray is beautiful ,the colours are bright and lovely to look at. The perfect gift for a young girl. Will recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Star Child

customer_reviews.title: Unicorns make you smarter!
customer_reviews.text: My adult daughter got this for me as a gag gift. Instead, it has proven to be one of the best lap desks I have owned. It is sturdy, the colors are vibrant and it is small enough I am not tripping over it all day. The beanbag type backing molds well to prop up the desk at an angle, which is useful for watching training videos.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Useful and colorful
customer_reviews.text: Used this item in a silent auction basket with donated books! Love the bright colors and lightweight feeling!
customer_reviews.author: Jane Fuller

customer_reviews.title: Niece loves it
customer_reviews.text: Smaller than an adult lap desk but just right for my 6 year old niece. It's cute but already dinged up but the kids have been rather brutal with it constantly carrying it around and banging into things. I am going to buy my other niece one too.
customer_reviews.author: SYLVIA GONZALEZ

customer_reviews.title: Just right
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my daughter for her birthday after she saw one in the store. She loves it. It's really cute although it is a tiny bit smaller than I had expected.
customer_reviews.author: SAM

customer_reviews.title: Great for coloring wherever!
customer_reviews.text: My son loves this for writing and coloring! Can be used on the floor, table, bed, in the car, etc!
customer_reviews.author: Piper H.

customer_reviews.title: Very nice for kids who go on long trips
customer_reviews.text: I only wish this had a zipper for crayons or headphones for tablet . . But very nice . . Very sturdy when driving around. My daughter watches her tablet on it, colors and reads . Best thing for long rides !!
customer_reviews.author: Oatmeal_Quenepa

customer_reviews.title: My granddaughter loved it!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect first day at a new school present for my granddaughter who is llama obsessed! So Cute!
customer_reviews.author: Robine13

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for relaxing while doing homework
customer_reviews.text: Got this for my seven year old to do homework on her bed or the couch. She loves it
customer_reviews.author: CASSANDRA O.

customer_reviews.title: Kids love them
customer_reviews.text: I got this for my daughter she loves it. She uses it everyday. It's super cute too. She uses it for writing as well as her chromebook.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great quality and size!
customer_reviews.text: Cute and my 3yo loves it! Excellent quality! The size is good so I’m sure it’s perfect for older kids too.
customer_reviews.author: Robyn

customer_reviews.title: Very well built and designed
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my daughter and she loves it. Uses it in her bed to read before going to sleep and in the car to read or draw. Well built. Very good product.
customer_reviews.author: T. Whitaker

customer_reviews.title: Well made and super cute.
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this for my 5 year old niece. She loves to draw and the lap desk gives her the freedom to draw just about anywhere. It is made well and is really cute for girls.
customer_reviews.author: Jen

customer_reviews.title: Happy campers!
customer_reviews.text: Very cute and as described! Ordered 5 for my grandchildren and they love them.
customer_reviews.author: starfishsp

customer_reviews.title: Perfect and practical
customer_reviews.text: The design is so whimsical and fun, and it's perfect for my daughter's lap for projects and her ipad. Very pleased.
customer_reviews.author: A. Lee

customer_reviews.title: Super cute
customer_reviews.text: Daughter is using for her laptop for virtual learning and LOVES it.
customer_reviews.author: Tearra Nay

customer_reviews.title: liked that the unicors horn was sticking out . color is vibrant .
customer_reviews.text: a bit larg for a childs tablet . would fit a adults tablet ,but wont fit lap top.
customer_reviews.author: J & J

customer_reviews.title: They really like them.
customer_reviews.text: My Grand children really love these and find them easy to carry and use!
customer_reviews.author: holly49

customer_reviews.title: As described
customer_reviews.text: As described, works great perfect size for smaller children great for my nieces homework!
customer_reviews.author: Ashlin

customer_reviews.title: Very nice gift for a child.
customer_reviews.text: Pretty and great, smaller than usual ,size is only for kids.
customer_reviews.author: florence

customer_reviews.title: My kids love these.
customer_reviews.text: My kids love their lap desks, and they're the critics that matter with this purchase. I purchased a Llama and a Dinosaur lapdesk for my kids.
customer_reviews.author: S. Barr

customer_reviews.title: Great size for younger kids!
customer_reviews.text: He loves his lap pad...just his size and so cute!
customer_reviews.author: MamaWorkIt

customer_reviews.title: Daughter loves it !
customer_reviews.text: My 7 year old daughter loves this! She uses it for drawing/coloring in bed or for when she is doing her schoolwork on a laptop . It’s not very big so you can travel with it easy too.
customer_reviews.author: mamaof3

customer_reviews.title: Cute and useful
customer_reviews.text: We love it! My daughter loves pandas and I bought this lap desk for distance learning. This will give them a more comfortable option of using devices on the bed or couch instead of just at a desk. Great quality item!
customer_reviews.author: BT

customer_reviews.title: Unacceptable condition
customer_reviews.text: This product arrived in terrible condition. The design is all scratched up! Completely unacceptable.
customer_reviews.author: JMGriffith

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: It seems durable and it’s very cute. Great size for a 6 year old.
customer_reviews.author: You Had Me At Books

customer_reviews.title: Nice lap desk for a child
customer_reviews.text: This is a nice lap desk for a child. It has a handle to make carrying easy. It doesn’t have a slot to put a tablet, and that would make it more versatile.
customer_reviews.author: Rosie

customer_reviews.title: works well
customer_reviews.text: easy for a child to work on a crome book
customer_reviews.author: Robert I Wagner

customer_reviews.title: PAINT IS COMING OFF ON FIRST DAY...FROM USING A BOOK ON IT
customer_reviews.text: I really hope that the paint is non toxic. The entire surface is rubbing off.
customer_reviews.author: FL

customer_reviews.title: Perfect size.
customer_reviews.text: Just the right size for our 2 year old. Works great in the car for long trips so he can color.
customer_reviews.author: Nikki

customer_reviews.title: Damaged when it arrived
customer_reviews.text: Received today and like a lot of the reviews it was already damaged.
customer_reviews.author: Amy Lunsford

customer_reviews.title: Very good price and great gift idea
customer_reviews.text: This is replacing my oversized lap desk this is more comfortable
customer_reviews.author: Cindy

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for Drawing/Hanging on the Couch
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for daughter to use on her lap while lounging on the couch and coloring. She is 8 and the item is perfect in size and durability. Works for holding a plate of snack too. Adorable and good price.
customer_reviews.author: Aliyah

customer_reviews.title: Focus on the Go
customer_reviews.text: My daughter loves to carry this around so she can color anywhere in the house - not just at her desk. She’s only 3, so staying in one place can get tricky.
customer_reviews.author: Matthew Soriano

customer_reviews.title: Good overall
customer_reviews.text: I was surprised by how small this was. I liked the mobility and handle for ease of use, but no pockets or compartments. Those should really be added to improve the product.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: As I expected
customer_reviews.text: This product was as described in the listing. My child loves it.
customer_reviews.author: Kimberly Staley

customer_reviews.title: She likes it
customer_reviews.text: My daughter really likes it she writes on it all the time
customer_reviews.author: Mickey

customer_reviews.title: Lightweight, sturdy desk
customer_reviews.text: Desk is a good size, sturdy. Perfect for a long car ride.
customer_reviews.author: Kelly

customer_reviews.title: Lightweight, sturdy, and Adorable
customer_reviews.text: Bought for my son and he loves it! He was eyeing it at another store, but found this at a better deal! Can be used to read, do homework, view electronics, etc. Great purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Jessie

customer_reviews.title: Kid friendly
customer_reviews.text: Granddaughter loves it. Uses it for homework in n the car
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect size for a lap table
customer_reviews.text: This was perfect for my daughter on a long car ride to vacation. She colored for hours in the car and continues to use it at home
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfwct
customer_reviews.text: Purchased for my niece and she loves it. Works great for her to draw and color while in the car
customer_reviews.author: Kristyn Becker

customer_reviews.title: Good quality
customer_reviews.text: Nice looking. Good quality. Perfect for a Chromebook or smaller size lap top. Wish surface would have some sort of anti skid plate as laptop tends to slide off.
customer_reviews.author: Salvador Parra

customer_reviews.title: Love!
customer_reviews.text: My daughter uses this for all of her art and coloring projects. Adorable!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Used?
customer_reviews.text: Bought two. One was in a package and the other was not. It looks used. 😞
customer_reviews.author: TMB

customer_reviews.title: Really Cute!
customer_reviews.text: Much cuter than the pictures. Nice quality. Perfect size for our 4 year old granddaughter!!
customer_reviews.author: Renee

customer_reviews.title: Great gift !!!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: A present for my 5 yr old granddaughter just before a vacation trip. It was great for traveling !!! 💜⭐⭐⭐⭐💜
customer_reviews.author: sea breeze

customer_reviews.title: Just right
customer_reviews.text: Item exactly as described. My 7 year old loves it.
customer_reviews.author: Amillia kinsler

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for our daughter and she loves it! Good quality and comfortable for her to use it all her endeavors!
customer_reviews.author: Dvader76

customer_reviews.title: It is very helpful.
customer_reviews.text: My daughter loves it. Uses every night while doing homework.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: So Cute
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my friend's great-grandson on his birthday because he always liked her lap desk it when he visited her. He's 6 years old. He is crazy about the cat face on the top. He takes it wherever he goes and loves to draw and color pictures, so this just worked out great. So darned cute!
customer_reviews.author: Karen K.

customer_reviews.title: Very cute!
customer_reviews.text: My 9 year old absolutely loves this for when she uses her laptop she got issued to her from school.
customer_reviews.author: Jessie Rivera

product_meta.title: LapGear Lap Pets Lap Desk for Lil' Kids - Cat - Fits up to 11.6 Inch laptops - Style No. 46744
product_meta.description: Color:CatFrom Mystical creatures to favorite house pets, there’s a lap Pets lap desk waiting to be adopted. Each lap desk is designed to be a part of your child’s next activity: homework, Arts and crafts, or snack time! The smooth surface allows for pencils and crayons to glide across paper for even drawings and steady writing. The character-matching felt accents will captivate your child’s imagination to bring these animals to life. Keep them at home or take them on a trip Since the Lap Pets lap desks are portable with built-in handle.
feature_bullets: Fits LAPTOPS UP TO 11.6": Surface dimensions are 14. 5" X 11. 3".
Style: Exclusively designed animal faces with pop-out felt details and custom fabric.
Comfort: Cushion filling conforms to your lap.
Travel-friendly: Reinforced handle and lightweight product design make it easy to carry along.

specifications.Manufacturer: Creative Manufacturing, LLC dba Lap Desk
specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.7 out of 5 stars441 ratings4.7 out of 5 stars
